trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Monona
There were no other sightings in Monona on or around December 12th 2006
divs: Sighting Detailsi saw this ufo when i was about 7 or 8. but i remember it clearly. it was after a basketball game, we lost if it matters, we were going to pick my sister up from a friends house and i elected to stay in the car. i sat, and looked out the front window. then i saw an orange blob i was 8 and cant get an estamite of how far away it was. it didnt leave a tail, not a metor ect. it was orange, no airplane or helicoptor. it moved slowly and even though it was far away i estimate it was a centimeter long, that is if i put what i saw up to a ruler not the actually up close size of the object. it moved slowly from left to right before disappearing behind trees and a house. it seemed to be level at first then gradually dip down at a very slight angle, i cant be sure though.
